title: Lesson Study-Based Curriculum for Developing Preservice Biology Teachers' Instructional Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Emphasizing collaborative learning environments using personal devices and reflective practice through peer feedback

learning_goals: Participants can apply a systematic lesson design process based on biology curriculum content
Participants can identify and improve issues arising during lesson implementation through peer observation and feedback
Participants can strengthen pedagogical content knowledge (PCK) through reflective reflection in the lesson design process
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
